name: Create Revv Documents contacts from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new contact in Revv Documents. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1xZ3sbaWkY2EYT5gWtBIpPmmvdxYkSyf7W90TUlV_V6w/edit?usp=sharing).
